name: Rogue Like Card Battler
description:
You are a templar priest who must exorcise the dungeons and clear the dungeon.
My attempt on a rogue like battler for a jam I missed. used scriptable object workflow for cards, enemies and skills. For now it only has one level.
assets -Minifantasy Audio Pack by @Krishna_Palacio, 2d assets are not made by me except for the FX
